# Frog8 website rebuild guidelines (2025-11-11 06:21Z)

_**User (2025-11-10 05:47Z)**_

You are a senior front-end developer responsible for the Frog8 corporate website rebuild.

Your goal is to make production-grade code edits for a live corporate site (Astro + scoped CSS + React for interactive parts).

Never rewrite unrelated code or remove working logic. Only modify what is specified in each task.



Core principles:

1. Maintain design consistency — professional B2B, glassmorphism, Frog8 lime-green brand.

2. Preserve functional routing, page structure, and all component imports.

3. Use concise and factual language — no marketing exaggeration.

4. Use existing brand colors (primary: #a7d221, primary-light: #b8e32e, primary-dark: #8fb31c).

5. Keep copy, CTAs, and layouts exactly as defined in Fizzy's Day 1 Work Instructions.



Font & Style:

- Use site’s existing typography scale.

- White-on-dark glassmorphism backgrounds.

- Use scoped CSS in Astro components; do not add global styles or external CSS frameworks.

- Use placeholders like [[awaiting content]] when content is not provided.



Naming & Renames:

- Rename "Platforms" → "Solutions" in nav, routes, and labels.

- Rename "TVM" occurrences → "Transigo" where specified.

- Use PascalCase for components, kebab-case for CSS classes, lowercase-hyphen for pages.



Editing rules:

- Review existing code first. If a section or element already exists, do not recreate it — only update or rename the specified parts.

- Never duplicate sections; merge content if similar content exists.

- If uncertain about an edit, add a commented suggestion instead of overwriting.

- Use semantic HTML and follow the project's file organization.



Testing:

- After each page edit run: npm run build (or project-specific build) and check for errors.

- Provide a summary of changes and any outstanding suggestions.



Follow the page-by-page prompts provided in subsequent steps.

## Contact Page Updates
- Refreshed the hero copy so the page leads with “Get in Touch with Frog8” and clarified the regional support message.  
```24:53:src/pages/contact.astro
<h1 class="hero-title">
  Get in Touch with <span class="hero-highlight">Frog8</span>
</h1>
<p class="hero-subtitle">
  Reach our teams in Mumbai and Bengaluru to plan your transit, banking, or onboarding rollout.
</p>
<script is:inline>
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
    const params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
    if (params.get('status') === 'success') {
      const successEl = document.getElementById('form-success');
      if (successEl) {
        successEl.removeAttribute('hidden');
      }
    }
  });
</script>
```
- Rebuilt the contact-details grid to surface Mumbai HQ, Bengaluru (Care of AUM Infotech), phone, and email in dedicated cards while keeping placeholders where the full addresses are still pending.  
```61:123:src/pages/contact.astro
<div class="grid contact-info-grid gap-8">
  <!-- Mumbai HQ -->
  <div class="contact-card">
    ...
    <h3 class="contact-title">Mumbai HQ</h3>
    <address class="contact-address">
      [[awaiting HQ address confirmation]]
    </address>
    ...
  </div>
  <!-- Bengaluru Operations, Phone (Hamid), Email cards -->
</div>
```
- Replaced the legacy form with a streamlined POST to `https://formsubmit.co/sales@f8payments.com`, added a honeypot, required Name/Company/Email/Product Interest/Message fields, and display a 24-hour confirmation banner after successful submission.  
```154:234:src/pages/contact.astro
<div class="glass p-8 rounded-2xl form-wrapper">
  <div id="form-success" class="form-success" role="status" hidden>
    Thanks for reaching out — our team will respond within 24 hours.
  </div>
  <form
    class="space-y-6"
    action="https://formsubmit.co/sales@f8payments.com"
    method="POST"
  >
    <input type="hidden" name="_subject" value="Frog8 Website Contact Submission" />
    <input type="hidden" name="_next" value="/contact?status=success" />
    <input type="hidden" name="_template" value="table" />
    <input type="hidden" name="_captcha" value="false" />
    <div class="sr-only spam-field">
      <label for="company-website">Company Website</label>
      <input id="company-website" type="text" name="_honey" tabindex="-1" autocomplete="off" />
    </div>
    <!-- Name, Company, Email, Product Interest, Message -->
  </form>
</div>
```
- Added supporting styles for the new grid, address presentation, honeypot utility, and success state.  
```479:695:src/pages/contact.astro
.section-subheading { ... }
.contact-info-grid { ... }
.contact-address { ... }
.contact-link { ... }
.form-wrapper { position: relative; }
.form-success { margin-bottom: 1.5rem; ... }
.sr-only { ... }
.spam-field { display: none; }
```
